title: metric beacon_reqresp_rate_limiter_errors_total already registered

labels.name: prio-high
labels.description: Resolve issues as soon as possible.

body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the discord chat instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Describe the bug**

Just running dockerized lodestar:next errors immediately on boot

```
devops@gc-shadow-fork-4-lodestar-nethermind-0 ➜  ~ docker logs --tail 20 -f beacon
    at new Network (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/network/network.ts:74:20)
    at Function.init (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/node/nodejs.ts:185:21)

Nov-23 17:52:17.329[]                 info: Lodestar network=gnosis, version=v1.2.1/3373687, commit=33736871ce4945e049683c92bbe8e09e91a4b40d
Nov-23 17:52:17.499[]                 info: Connected to LevelDB database path=/beacondata/chain-db
Nov-23 17:52:20.866[]                 info: Initializing beacon from a valid db state slot=0, epoch=0, stateRoot=0x0299c4155dfa34af0e145ab4c2ce1d84e059b5e1b387f96efa0de4c0e2b35bd1, isWithinWeakSubjectivityPeriod=true
 ✖ Error: A metric with the name beacon_reqresp_rate_limiter_errors_total has already been registered.
    at RegistryMetricCreator.registerMetric (/usr/app/node_modules/prom-client/lib/registry.js:80:10)
    at new Metric (/usr/app/node_modules/prom-client/lib/metric.js:48:13)
    at new Gauge (/usr/app/node_modules/prom-client/lib/gauge.js:20:1)
    at new GaugeExtra (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/metrics/utils/gauge.ts:16:5)
    at RegistryMetricCreator.gauge (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/metrics/utils/registryMetricCreator.ts:14:12)
    at getMetrics (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/node_modules/@lodestar/reqresp/src/metrics.ts:104:31)
    at new ReqResp (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/node_modules/@lodestar/reqresp/src/ReqResp.ts:49:46)
    at new ReqRespBeaconNode (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/network/reqresp/ReqRespBeaconNode.ts:79:5)
    at new Network (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/network/network.ts:74:20)
    at Function.init (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/node/nodejs.ts:185:21)
```

**Expected behavior**

Ǹot crash
